synopsis.text: Miyata Yuri and Meguro Megumi, two high school students from Tokyo Metropolitan Miyake Girls High School, dive into the thrilling world of competitive motorcycle sidecar racing on Miyake Island. Despite their contrasting personalities and frequent disagreements, they form a formidable team, with Yuri as the cool-headed driver and Megumi as the acrobatic passenger. As they race against other unique teams from across Japan, each with their own quirks and opposing traits, the girls strive to claim the top spot in the 'kneeler race.' This original anime by Silver Link marks their 10th anniversary and promises an exciting journey filled with adrenaline-pumping action and dynamic teamwork.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
